name: Jira Ticket Link Generator
author: Junhao Zhang
description: Generates a nice looking link for Jira tickets containing ticket ID, description and link

generate-link-for-single-ticket.description: Generate link for a specific link from selected ticket on rapid board, selected ticket on search board, or ticket shown in ticket detail page.

generate-link-for-all-tickets.description: Generate link for all tickets shown up in Jira search result board.
